name: Snowman Sculptor
description:
You have to build as many perfect  snowmen as you can before the time runs out. Hold down the button to scoop snow and make your snowballs the perfect size.

Unfortunately I wasn't able to finish the game in time. I wished I could have changed the placeholder art, added music/sound, better UI... But I am glad I could deliver at least something that is not completely broken and I succeeded at  submitting something for my first attempt at the Godot Wild Jam :)

Special thanks to Samifit and Yoranator!
